title: Establishes additional requirements for firearm license: completion of a course in firearm safety, use, maintenance, relevant laws, and first aid
summary: Establishes additional requirements for firearm license including completion of a course in firearm safety, use, maintenance, relevant laws and first aid and upon approval by district attorney by a showing of extraordinary likelihood of need to defend oneself from imminent danger or death.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to license to carry and possess firearms
